messages.subject: E-mail address
messages.msgSnippet: Richard, I am having a difficult time e-mailing you a large picture of the Mei of the Myochin Tsuba. Would you e-mail me at laura-elliott@comcast.net so that I
messages.messageBody:
Richard,

I am having a difficult time e-mailing you a large picture of the Mei
of the Myochin Tsuba.

Would you e-mail me at laura-elliott@... so that I may obtain
your correct e-mail address?

I have an e-mail address for you that didn't work.

Thanks,

Elliott
